# 1. Flux Density ($J_v$)

Convert velocity ($V_h$) to Flux Density ($J_v$) using wood properties (Density, Moisture).

$$J_v = V_h 	imes rac{\rho_b}{\rho_s} (m_c + c_{dw})$$

```r
flux <- apply_flux_conversion(vh_sdma, wood_properties = wood)
```

# 2. Sapwood Integration

Scale point measurements to the whole tree sapwood area.

## Weighted Average Method
Divides sapwood into rings corresponding to each sensor.

```r
areas <- calc_sapwood_areas(
  dbh = 25,           # cm
  sapwood_depth = 2.5 # cm
)

tree_flow <- calc_sap_flux(
  flux_density = flux,
  sapwood_areas = areas
)
```

# 3. Daily Aggregation

Sum instantaneous flow (L/hr) to daily totals (L/day).

```r
daily <- aggregate_daily(tree_flow)
```
